description:
If you're a huge basketball fan, this is the app for you! Basketball Fans provides you with access to the latest news, videos, stats, schedule, standings and scores for all 30 professional teams.  It’s like getting 30 apps in one!  You can easily switch between teams to get the latest info for each one.  Included in the app are Atlanta, Boston, Charlotte, Chicago, Cleveland, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, Golden State, Houston, Indiana, Los Angeles C, Los Angeles L, Memphis, Miami, Milwaukee, Minnesota, New Jersey, New Orleans, New York, Oklahoma City, Orlando, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Portland, Sacramento, Toronto, Utah and Washington.

Each team has its own message board where you can discuss the latest news and highlights with other fans.  Make sure your voice is heard! 

There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with your favourite basketball teams. If you are a true fan, you owe it to yourself to download Basketball Fans today! 

** Brighthouse Labs and the Basketball Fans application are in no way associated with the NBA.  All trademarks are owned by their respective owners.
